title: Hitoyo Hitoyoni Hitomigoro.
alternative_title: Hitoyo, Hitoyoni, Hitomigoro. ; ヒトよ ヒトよに 人見頃。
status: Hitoyo, Hitoyoni, Hitomigoro. ; ヒトよ ヒトよに 人見頃。
description:
Description :
        It would be so much easier if I could just be myself, but why can't I do that?   A woman in her 30s who is perfect on the outside but messy on the inside.  A young girl who falls in love.  The handsome boss who is crazy about love.  A self-conscious female office worker who loves to improve herself.  The natural boy who can't get a sense of distance from people.   Peeking into the love lives of these clumsy humans, the pets think: "Human love is so fragile. Human love is so stubborn."

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4: Case By: Oda Kanoko
Vol.1 Chapter 3: Case By: Chief Katou
Vol.1 Chapter 1: Case By: Matsuno Fumiko
